data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Farias, Emanuelle de Sousa, Pereira Junior, Antonio Marques, Felippe-Bauer, Maria Luiza, Pessoa, Felipe Arley Costa, Medeiros, Jansen Fernandes, Santarem, Maria Clara Alves (2016): Culicoideshildebrandoi, a new species of the reticulatus species group from the Brazilian Amazon Region (Diptera, Ceratopogonidae). ZooKeys 571: 105-111, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.571.7341, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.571.7341
